recipe_name: Broccoli with chilli and garlic oil
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the broccoli florets into a pan of boiling salted water and boil for four minutes. Drain well.  Heat the olive oil in a wok, add the chilli and garlic and stir fry for one minute. Add the broccoli and stir. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then spoon into a serving dish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 small head broccoli, cut into florets,  Â½ red chilli, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
